verses.content: Chun, dîl râl, Gerasin mihai ram chu an hung tlung a.
Chun, lawnga inthawka a suok chau chun mi pakhat, khawhri inthieng naw iman thlâna inthawka hung suok chun ân tuokpui tah a;
chu mipa chun thlâna dâm chun umna a nei hlak a, tukhawmin khaidiet khawmin an khit thei ta nawh a;
kawlhai le khaidiethai khawmin an khit rawp ta hlak a, anachu khaidiethai dâm chu a keitan a, kawlhai dâm khawm chu a sukbawng pei hlak a; tukhawmin an sukdawl zo nawh a.
A sûn a zânin thlânahai le tlângahai chun a khêk hlak a, lung dâm khawmin ân ât rawp hlak a.
Chun, hlataka inthawkin Isu chu a hei hmu phingleh a tlân a, chibai a va bûk a.
Chun, râwl inringtaka khêkin, “Isu, Pathien Chunghnungtak Nau- pa, kei le nang ieng am ei inzâwlna a um a? Mi sawisa naw hrâm dingin Pathien hmingin ka ngên ṭal che a nih,” a ta.
(Isu chun a kuomah, “Nang khawhri inthieng naw, mihriem sûnga hi suok rawh,” a lo ti nghâl tah a.)
Chun, Isu chun, “I hming ieng am a na?” tîn ân dawn a. Ama chun a kuomah, “Ka hming chu Nuoia a nih, tamtak kan ni sih a,” a ta.
Chun, chu rama inthawk chun anni tir hmang lo dingin Isu kuomah a ngên ṭal tah a.
Chun, chutaka tlâng panga chun vawk ruol tamtak an tlah a.
Chun, khawhri inthieng nawhai chun, “Vawkhai kuoma sawn mîn fêtir rawh; an sûnga kan lût theina dingin,” tiin a kuomah an ngên a.

Ama chun a phal pêk a. Chuongchun, khawhri inthieng naw- hai chu an suok a, vawkhai sûnga chun an lût a, chuongchun, vawk ruol chu (sâng hni lai an na) rawlah an tlân thlah a, dîlah an tlân lût a; chuongchun, dîla chun tui an inhâk hlum tah a.
Chun, a vâituhai chu an tlân a, khuo le lohaia dâm chun an hril a. Chun, “Ieng am a ni ta leh?” tia en dingin an hung khâwm tâwl a.
Chun, Isu kuom an hung tlung a, khawhri iman, nuoia iman kha, puon sila, lungril ngai puta ṭhung an hmuh a, chuongchun, an ṭi tah a.
Chun, a hretuhai chun khawhri imanpa chunga thil hung tlung zie le, vawk chanchinhai chu chuonghai kuoma chun an lo hril a.
Chun, chuonghai chun Isu chu an rama inthawka suok dingin an ngên tah a.
Chun, lawnga a chuong ding lai takin, khawhri imanpa khan Isu kuoma um zing a ngên a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a phal nawh a, a kuomah, “I ina i ruolhai kuomah fe la, Lalpain thil a thawpêk che hi a ropuizie le a lunginsietzie che hi va hril rawh,” a ti ta lem a.
Chuongchun, a feh a, Dekapoli khuohaia chun Isûn a ta dinga thil a thawpêkhai ropuizie chu a khêk vêlpui tah a; chun, mi po po chun mak an ti hle a.
Chun, Isu chu lawnga râl khing tieng a hung kai nâwk chun, mipui nasatak a kuomah an hung khâwm a, ama chu dîl panga chun a um a.
Chun, inkhâwmna hotuhai laia mi pakhat, a hming Jaira chu a hung a, Isu a hmu phingleh a ke bulah a bawkkhup a,
“Ka naunu naupangte a thi vâng vâng a, a hung hara, a hung dam theina dingin, hunga a chunga i kut innghat dingin ka ngên che,” tiin a ngên ṭal a.
Chuongchun, Isu chu ama le chun an va feh a, chun, mipui nasatakin an zui a, an hneng sup sup a.
Chun, nuhmei pakhat kum sâwmpahni thipûtin a damnawh a,
dâktawr tamtak kuomah nasa- takin a tuor tah a, a nei po po khawm chu a sêng zo tah a, ṭhathnem nêkin a zuol deu deu lem a.
Chu minu chun Isu chanchin a lo hriet a, a hnungah mipui lai chun a hung a, a puon chu a them a,
“A puon chau khawm them lang sukdamin um el ka tih,” a ti lungril a nih.
Chuongchun, kârloin a thipût chu a hung bo nghâl tah a, a natna chu sukdam a ni tah ti a taksa chun ân hriet tah a.
Chun, Isu chun a sûnga thil- thawtheina chu a suok ti a lo hriet a, mipui lai chun a ngha vêl nghâl tah a, “Tu am a na ka puon them kha?” a ta.
Chun, a inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Mipuiin an hneng sup sup che hi i hmu nghâl a, ‘Tu am a na a mi them,?’ iengtiziea ti am i na?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a themtu chu hmu tumin a en vêl a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei chun a chunga Isu thil thawzie chu hrein ṭi le inthin pumin a hung a, a hmaah a bawkkhup a, a kuomah thu indik- takin a hril vawng tah a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ka naunu, i ringna hi i dampui a nih, lungmuongtakin fe la, i natna chu lo dam sawng ta raw se,” a ta.
A la ṭawng zing laiin in- khâwmna in hotu ina inthawkin mi an hung a, “I naunu a thi tah, ieng- dingin am inchûktirtu hi la suksâwl rawp i ta?” an ta.
Isu ruok chun, an thu hril chu ngaisak loin inkhâwmna in hotu kuoma chun, “Ṭi naw, awi el rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Peter hai, Jakob hai, Jakob unau Johan hai chau naw chu tukhawm ama zui ve a phal ta nawh a.
Chun, inkhâwmna in hotu in chu an va tlung a, Isu chun an lo buoi mur mur le, an lo ṭap veng vung a, an khêk tuor tuor chu a va hmuh a.
Chun, a va lût chun, an kuomah, “Iengdinga inri veng vunga ṭap am in na? naupang chu a thi nawh, a in lem a nih,” a ta.
Anni hlak chun an nuisan el a; ama hlak chun an rêngin a hnawt dawk a, naupang nu le pa le a kuoma umhai chu a ṭhuoi a, naupang umnaa chun a va lût a.
Chun, naupang kut chu a chel a, a kuoma chun, “Talitha kumi,” a ta. Chu chu, “Bawinu tho rawh ka ti che,” tina a nih.
Chun, naupangnu chu a hung tho a, a fe thei nghâl tah a; ama chu kum sâwmpahni mi a ni hrim tah a. Chun, anni chun namênin mak an ti nawh a.
Chun, amân an kuomah, “Hi hi tukhawmin hre naw raw hai se,” a ti tlat a, chun fâk ding pêk ding thu a pêk tah a.
